trans-unit.source: Software Discovery, Install and Inventory with PackageManagement
trans-unit.target: Software Discovery, Install and Inventory with PackageManagement

trans-unit.source: PackageManagement (aka OneGet) is a new way to discover and install software packages from around the web.
trans-unit.target: PackageManagement (aka OneGet) is a new way to discover and install software packages from around the web.

trans-unit.source: It is a manager or multiplexor of existing package managers (also called package providers) that unifies Windows package management with a single Windows PowerShell interface.
trans-unit.target: It is a manager or multiplexor of existing package managers (also called package providers) that unifies Windows package management with a single Windows PowerShell interface.

trans-unit.source: With PackageManagement, you can do the following.
trans-unit.target: With PackageManagement, you can do the following.

trans-unit.source: Manage a list of software repositories in which packages can be searched, acquired, and installed
trans-unit.target: Manage a list of software repositories in which packages can be searched, acquired, and installed

trans-unit.source: Discover and install different package managers
trans-unit.target: Discover and install different package managers

trans-unit.source: Seamlessly install, uninstall, and inventory packages from one or more software repositories
trans-unit.target: Seamlessly install, uninstall, and inventory packages from one or more software repositories
